author: Barbara Starr, Ryan Browne and Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
title: Military puts police units on alert for possible deployment to Minnesota for protests
description: The US military on Friday ordered several police units to be ready for potential deployment to Minnesota as the state experiences protests over the death of George Floyd.
source.name: CNN

author: Paul French, for CNN
title: His escape to Macao in World War II laid the foundation for a $14.9 billion fortune
description: When Stanley Ho Hung-sun, the man who made Macao a global gambling mecca, died at age 98 this week he was reportedly worth $14.9 billion.
content:

title: Video shows deputy repeatedly punching woman in head

title: Michelle Obama: It's up to everyone to root out racism
description: Non-black folks also need to help root out racism, former first lady Michelle Obama said this week, while speaking out over the death of George Floyd.
